title.narrative: Water Sector Improvement APL Phase II: Metolong Dam and Water Supply

description.narrative: The Project Development Objectives are to support the Recipient in: (i) developing and sustaining an environmentally sound, socially responsible, and financially viable framework for the MDWSP; (ii) increasing the quantity of safe, bulk water supplied toTeyateyaneng; (iii) strengthening institutions and related instruments in the water sector; (iv) advancing strategic infrastructure investments; and (v) in the event of an Eligible Crisis or Emergency, to provide immediate and effective response to said Eligible Crisis or Emergency.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Natural Resources, Metolong Authority

condition.narrative: CERC - Finance Agreement Section IV: Eligible Crisis or Emergency has occurred; IDA has agreed and notified Recipient of inclusionof response activities under the CERC. Safeguards Instruments prepared and disclosed by Recipient. Recipientâ€™s CoordinatingAuthority has adequate staff. CERC Operations Manual adopted in form, substance and manner acceptable to IDA.

Finance Agreement :Section V (a) | Description :Submit the final text of an operation and maintenance plan, including a dam safetyinstrumentation plan, before bid tendering process for Metolong Dam is launched. | Due Date :30-Jun-2010

Finance Agreement :Section V (b) | Description :Submit a final text of the Emergency Preparedness Plan and the First ImpoundmentPlan of Metlong Dam (or 12 months before impoundment). | Due Date :16-Feb-2012

Finance Agreement :Section V (c) | Description :Confirm institutional arrangements for ownership and management of infrastructureworks is finalized (or 12 months before impoundment). | Due Date :12-Dec-2011

Finance Agreement :Section V (d) | Description :Ensure i) Environmental and Social PoE is maintained during the period ofimplementation of the Project and MDWSP, ii)copies of each report and technical documents are submitted | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section V (e) | Description :Ensure i) Dam Safety PoE is maintained until least 6 months from date of fullimpoundment, and ii) copies of each report and technical documents submitted. | Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Section V (f) | Description :Submit evidence of successful completion of Cultural Resource Management andDevelopment Plan prior to impoundment. | Due Date :30-Sep-2013
Finance Agreement :Section V (g) | Description :i) Submit draft Governance Improvement Plan, ii) adopt GIP and iii) carry outannual evaluations of GIP compliance | Due Date :15-Jan-2010
